TopicTitle: Minmus base - Fuel resource transfer not working (KIS/KAS)

Articles.Content:
Hey,

I'm relatively new to this game and earlier spent 10 hours of my life trying to get one rocket in to orbit, so my patience is at breaking point!

I've landed some mining refinery systems, and I'm trying to use the base boxes and yellow tube to send fuel from the refinery (right of image) in to a reusable ship (left of image).  You will see that due to the distance (maybe this is the problem?) I have had to use two boxes.  However, you will see the resource transfer is greyed out and I can't find any way to get it flowing...

Any suggestions? There is undocked and docked mode, but I think they are in the right mode because otherwise these GUI boxes don't appear.

Could it be because you are not allowed to use two boxes?

Cheers,

Matthew

Moved to Technical Support (PC, modded installs).

@Matthew Morris, you probably should ask in the KIS/KAS post too.

21 minutes ago, peteletroll said:

Moved to Technical Support (PC, modded installs).

@Matthew Morris, you probably should ask in the KIS/KAS post too.

Oh sure, sorry - and thank you!
Nothing to be sorry about - and, welcome to the forum!

I’m going to suggest that you try the Simple Logistics mod instead of an elaborate KIS/KAS setup- SL works when you’re inside physics range so doesn’t need a physical connection between vessels (which can be glitchy especially with KIS connectors) and will add a SL module to every command part, both stock and from most mods, so there’s no need for extra parts.

You may need to trim out a couple of SL patches for the Breaking Ground deployable science things as these can make 1.10 freeze on loading.
